items.question: Q: How do I get gifts?
items.answer:
• There are several Gifts available in the game. One of the gifts is to invite friends and get free spins.
• When you log in your Gmail account to the game, then you can earn some daily free spins from the game.

items.question: Q: How to protect your village?
items.answer:
• Protect your village by using shield.
• You can also protect your village by hatching a Rhino.
